about_the_game:
Step into the concrete heart of the post-Soviet era in "Doma". Delve deep into the architectural psyche of a bygone epoch, and craft iconic Soviet panel buildings block by meticulous block.


You can build with 4 block versions and 2 gamemodes

Gamemodes

- Historical Mode: You build already existing series of panel buildings by using a layout we prepared for you. Try to get as accurate as you can!

- Creative Mode: You build anything that comes to your mind. There are no limits!

Blocks

- II-35: Most popular basic Soviet era panel type. Nothing much about it.

- P-101: Modernised panel type with a little mode designer solutions.

- II-18: Modified II-35 version, ussually building up to 9 floors maximum.

- KOPE: One of the latest panel versions, usually used in the high rise 9+ floor buildings. Also dark red tiles were used in here.


With every structure, you don't just build a building - you forge a piece of history. The houses you are going to build are already exsisting somewhere in the lost part of Belarus, Ukraine, Lithuania... Anywhere...
